Articles.Content:
bad news everyone....

34% of all Kerbals believe the Mun landing was a hoax... filmed on the runway island.....

worse....

a whopping 93% of all kerbals believe that an alien from a planet called "Earth" is controlling everything they do...

those kerbals are truly stupid... they believe anything....

NO CONSPIRACIES HERE!!

Just Kidding. Yes i heard that story about the secret island runway film studios too...
Pfft Humans, Nah we Kerbals are the superior race.
If those moon landings were really real, how come the only photographs we have of it all come from a seemingly magical, invisible camera mounted at a varying angle about 20' above the scene?

Ever wondered what those little balls of condensation are floating up in the sky? Sometimes they look similar to remnants of a kontrail..

It has been heard by few in the corners of the VAB, the talk of kemtrails. That 'they are' trying to make kerbals more courageous and stupid.

Oh the humanity of it all.....

What are those teachers teaching the young Kerbals....

BTW.... ever wondered why there are no cities or towns on kerbal????

Its simple really, there is NO weather on Kerbal, and no clouds, if they are on the surface, they would be dead within days...

They all live underground.

(which makes sense in a funny sort of way.....)
There is life on Duna people! The powers that be at KSP are hiding the truth!

Well, I'm not seeing what kind of game this is, so since this seems to be mainly a chat thread (and because conspiracy theories are against the rules indeed), I don't see a reason for this thread to go on.

/thread
